activities: Clinical trials and research relating to medical devices. In most cases trial data will be used in submissions to regulatory authorities for clearance or approval of medical devices. In other cases, aggregated, de-identified data will be published in scientific journals or presented at scientific conferences.
contacttitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Health and clinical trial research data, including, but not limited to, information relating to trial subjects and research staff. Data covered includes manually processed data.
